name: Dolphin
text:
We are celebrating our 300th birthday and have heard of your amazing fire-works! We wish a happy and fabulous evening in the name of rainbows and glittering water-drops.
Peace and love!!
postiveFeedback:
In the name of starry skies that was a wonderful display!
We thank you from the bottom of our hearts <3 <3 <3 <3
negativeFeedback:
Oh, sigh...
We had wished for a more colorful and spectacular display...
Please, think carefully about this!
